name: Project Makeover
summary: Come to the rescue of those in need and give them a makeover so they can achieve their dreams! Choose the most chic clothes, hairstyles, makeup and even furniture! Take on histrionic characters like egotistical fashion icons, conniving assistants, or headstrong clients in need of a new wardrobe. Solve complex fashion puzzles to find the perfect look. And don't forget to customize your avatar to create your own style!
